ia.title: Automation with Artificial Intelligence

testimonial_section.title: Outliers Solutions Results
testimonial_section.subtitle: More than 10 satisfied clients can't be wrong!

testimonials.name: Marcelo Gallardo
testimonials.quote: I am pleased to express my complete satisfaction and highly recommend Outliers Solutions' services. I contacted Outliers Solutions to redesign my personal academic website, as the previous version lacked several functionalities and organization. The team at Outliers Solutions fully handled the design, structure, operability, and arrangement of my site, achieving highly satisfactory results. I especially highlight their constant, effective, and precise communication, as well as their significant competitive advantage in terms of costs. It is clear that Outliers Solutions is a highly competitive firm in the market, with innovative technology and an efficient cost structure that allows them to offer top-quality services at a very reasonable price.

testimonials.name: Nicole & Caroline
testimonials.quote: We needed a website for our nonprofit organization called GIVE. Although we are just teenagers starting this donation circle, we had some ideas for this website and you made them a reality. We approached with a basic draft and you transformed it into a well-detailed, professional, and interactive website. We really appreciated how understanding and patient you were with every change or update we requested. The customer service was incredible, you always maintained a positive attitude and were kind when handling each update. We would definitely recommend this service because it was extremely helpful and very well done.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.description: Your privacy is our priority. We are committed to protecting and respecting your personal data.

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content: We collect only the necessary information to schedule consultations, such as your name, email address, and phone number. We also collect limited information during your interactions in our real-time chat.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: We use your data solely to schedule consultations, personalize your experience, and improve our digital marketing, software development, and AI automation services. We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties.

sections.title: Data Protection
sections.content: We apply advanced security measures to protect your personal data, such as SSL encryption, internal privacy policies, and industry best practices in information security.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, update, or request deletion of your personal information at any time. You can also opt-out of receiving commercial communications from us.

consent.title: Consent
consent.content: By using our website and interactive chat services, you agree to our Privacy Policy and consent to the processing of your personal data as outlined herein.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions, concerns, or wish to exercise your rights regarding your personal data, you can contact us:

hero_marketing_section.title: Web Development & Digital Marketing
hero_marketing_section.description: We combine custom web design and result-driven digital strategies to grow your online presence and increase your sales.

projects.title: Fashion Button
projects.subtitle: We created an online store for Fashion Button, specializing in selling buttons and sewing accessories. The site stands out for its easy navigation and design focused on enhancing the shopping experience for textile supplies.

projects.title: Carolina Oleas, CPA
projects.subtitle: We developed the professional website for Carolina Oleas, a public accountant in New York, highlighting her accounting services and facilitating contact with potential clients through a clean and direct design.

projects.title: Marcelo Gallardo Burga
projects.subtitle: We designed an academic website for Marcelo Gallardo, a mathematician and researcher at PUCP, organizing and presenting his publications, research lines, and professional profile clearly and accessibly.

projects.title: TheGiveCircle
projects.subtitle: We collaborated with TheGiveCircle, a nonprofit teaching English to Latin Americans in the U.S., developing a functional and attractive website that communicates their mission and facilitates access to their educational programs.

projects.title: D'carlos
projects.subtitle: We designed a site for D’carlos, showcasing their shoe collections and specialized cleaning service. We combined a modern design with a clear presentation of their services.

projects.title: Adrián Díaz Marro
projects.subtitle: We created a personal site for Adrián Díaz Marro, a Spanish entrepreneur and consultant based in China, where he shares his experiences, business development services, and his travels documented authentically.
